<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Leukodaemon (Pestilence Daemon)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2893)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These skull-headed, vulture-winged daemons are harbingers of pestilence and servants of their patron Apocalypse Rider, [Apollyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=134). Manifestations of evil souls who perished from disease in life, leukodaemons work tirelessly alongside one another to spread disease across all the worlds of the multiverse.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Leukodaemon.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Leukodaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2893)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Daemon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=568" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=600" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 74 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +20; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), plaguesense ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Plaguesense** A leukodaemon senses any creature with a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), and they know the type and current stage of all diseases carried by any creature within range.

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=434)_ (50 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +19 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 155

</row>

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578)

**Weaknesses**
[holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) 10

**Infectious Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578)) 30 feet. Leukodaemons radiate infection. All creatures within 30 feet of a leukodaemon take a –2 status penalty to saves against [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578). If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21 ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 2d12+9 piercing plus daemonic pestilence

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 slashing plus daemonic pestilence

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +21 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 piercing plus daemonic pestilence

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 26
- **4th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (×2), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (at will)
- **5th**
[Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724)

**Daemonic Pestilence**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) The leukodaemon can telepathically communicate with the afflicted creature at any distance on the same plane; **Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier (1 day); **Stage 2** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) (1 day); **Stage 3** drained 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** drained 2 (1 day); **Stage 5** drained 3 (1 week); **Stage 6** dead

**Plague Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)) The leukodaemon exhales a cloud of corpse-bloated, biting black flies in a 20-foot cone. Creatures within the cone take 4d8 piercing damage (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails the save becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) (or sickened 2 on a critical failure).

**Quicken Pestilence** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The leukodaemon coaxes a disease into full bloom. They choose a target in their aura of pestilence that's currently affected by a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578). That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the disease as if the interval for the disease's current stage had passed.

</column>
